auth.email_to_reset_password: Please enter your email address to reset the password
auth.reset_password_success: Please check your email for reset password link. Once you reset the password, use your new password for sign in
auth.name: Name
auth.confirm_password_not_matching: Password and confirm password are not matching
auth.i_have_verified_my_email: I Have Verified My Email Address
auth.thank_you_for_verifying_email: Thank you for verifying your email address. You will be signed in to the app now
auth.verify_email_message: Your email address needs to be verified prior to sign in. Please verify your email address by clicking the link that is sent to your email. Once it is verified click on the I have verified my email address button
auth.email_not_verified_yet: Your email address is not verified yet. Please wait few seconds and try again if you have already verified your email address
auth.sign_out_confirmation: Are you sure you want to sign out?

auth_errors.no_user_found: There is no user record corresponding to this email address.
auth_errors.wrong_password: The password is invalid or the user does not have a password
auth_errors.weak_password: The password provided is too weak
auth_errors.account_already_exist: The account already exists for that email
auth_errors.account_exist_with_same_email: An account already exists with the same email address but different front-in credentials. Sign in in using a provider associated with this email address
auth_errors.google_sign_in_failed: Failed to front in with Google.
auth_errors.facebook_sign_in_failed: Failed to front in with Facebook.
auth_errors.facebook_sign_in_canceled: Failed to front in with Facebook.
auth_errors.too_many_requests: Too many requests to verify the email. Please try again in a while
